channel.title: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements
channel.description:
How do I change Item Requiments.
eg. Dragon claws - You need to have a defence level of 60.
I want it to be attack level of 60, This is a custom server using Pkerslyfe Client and the source.
If you could help me that would be great.
Thank-you.
-Monkey Money30.

item.title: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Your ints are checking for the starting name, so “Dragon” (being checked under defence) will check all items that start with Dragon. So, a solution to this would be if(itemID == int), but you would have to remove “Dragon” for defence, and give each individual dragon defence item a return value.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements

item.title: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

	} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon Claws")) {
		return 60;

Put that under your “Attack” section of Wearing.java

But what weapon is the Dragon Claws actually, i mean when you are not on a client it should be another weapon.
Like Dragon Platebody on most servers is actually a mithril platebody.

item.title: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Oh I found this is wearing.java

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon 2h Sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("axe") || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.startsWith("Guthans") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; }

And the attack one is

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon 2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon axe") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("Green d") || ItemName2.startsWith("Blue d") || ItemName2.startsWith("Red d") || ItemName2.startsWith("Black d") || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 70; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel defender")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black defender")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril defender")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant defender")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune defender")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Bow sword")) { return 85;} } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon axe")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White scimitar")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White 2h")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Zamorak godsword")) { return 75; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Armadyl godsword")) { return 75; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Bandos godsword")) { return 75; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Saradomin godsword")) { return 75; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite maul")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ancient staff")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Void")) { return 42; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack hood")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack cape")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Saradomin sword")) { return 70; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 70; } return 1; }

So where do I put the dragon claws thing the dragon claws ID is 8002. Can you please tell me excactly what to do.

Read full topic

item.source: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements

item.title: Changing Level for Item wielding Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35
item.description:
@Maxie35 wrote:

Well, it depends which item you want to use, ill take Dragon claws as example.

First you want to open your client.java and then search for:

public int GetCLAttack

If you want the requirement to be defence just change “attack” to defence and search for that.

Then you would see a list, like this:

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 10704) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 10705) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 10706) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 15334) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 15333) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 15336) { return 80; } if (ItemID == 15335) { return 80;

In there you want to add your item (dragon claws in this case)
so in between it add:

if (ItemID == Item Id here) { return 60; }

Where is says: “item id here” change it to the id of D claws. where is says return 60, change the 60 to the requirement you want it to be.

Make sure it fits in good, so you wont get errors about the { and }.

I hope this helped, if you have any further questions about it just ask

Maxie35.

Read full topic
